Reviews.Title: Nice product!
Reviews.Author: Sam I Am "I am what I am"
Reviews.Content: I bought this product expecting to see a drop in quality - it was part of a system to connect a PC and a HD video camera system to a projector on another side of a gymnasium/multi-purpose room. To say it worked well is an understatement - we are running through 100 feet of cat-5e cable and the picture looks every bit as good as connecting the projector directly to the machine using a VGA cable. I am totally impressed with the ease of set-up, quality of the balun (it even comes with velcro to mount it), and quality of the image transfer.As a result, I am buying another set of baluns to allow presenters to use their own laptops on-stage but tie into our audio-video booth on the back side of an auditorium.

ProductInfo.Features:
1 Input Device
1 Output Device
350 ft Range
1 x Network (RJ-45)
45)
ProductInfo.Name: Vga Balun Ii Db15 Female Monitor Side Side
